1.title: Calum Worthy Visits FHO
1.plot: Calum Worthy talks about being on Disney Channel's Austin and Ally, tries out the "GIFinator" and goofs around with Fiona and Mitchell on the first episode of FHO.

2.title: Calum Worthy Visits FHO - OUTTAKES!
2.plot: Last week on FHO, Disney Channel's Calum Worthy stopped by to hangout with Fiona and Mitchell. They had so much fun hanging out, that we had to share these hilarious outtakes with you all.

3.title: Walt Disney World Selfies and MILES BROWN!
3.plot: This week on FHO, Mitchell and Fiona play "Pitch Purrrfect" (Mitchell MEOWS famous Disney Parks songs!), Carly shows us some of the best Selfie spots in Walt Disney World, and Miles Brown from ABC's Black-ish drops by to hangout.

4.title: FHO OUTTAKES With MILES BROWN!
4.plot: Last week on FHO, Miles Brown from ABC's Black-ish stopped by the set and it was AWESOME. The friends had so much fun hanging out, that we had to share these hilarious outtakes with you all.

5.title: Peyton List Visits FHO!
5.plot: Fiona and Mitchell play So True, So False and Peyton List from Disney Channel's Bunk'd stops by to play Hashtag Bag.

6.title: FHO Episode 3 Outtakes
6.plot: Last week on FHO, Peyton List from Disney Channel's Bunk'd stopped by the set and it was awesome. Fiona and Mitchell had so much fun hanging out before Peyton got there, that we had to capture all the craziness and share it with you in this special FHO Outtakes episode.

7.title: Captain Sparklez Visits FHO
7.plot: Captain Sparklez drops by FHO to hangout with Fiona and Mitchell and play Stack Attack.

8.title: Captain Sparklez Full FHO Interview
8.plot: We loved having Captain Sparklez on FHO and wanted to share the full uncut interview with you all.

9.title: Jake Short Visits FHO
9.plot: Jake Short from Disney XD's Lab Rats Elite Force stops by FHO to hangout with Mitchell and Fiona. Watch as Jake tries his hand at some classic Disney impersonations.

10.title: FHO's Mitchell and Fiona Are Finally at Walt Disney World!
10.plot: Mitchell and Fiona are finally doing their own Best Day Ever at Walt Disney World. Join the stars of FHO as they ride Rock 'n' Roller Coaster, Splash Mountain, the Seven Dwarves Mine Train and take a few selfies with Disney favorites, of course.

11.title: AJ Rafael Performs on FHO
11.plot: AJ Rafael drops by FHO to perform "The Tiki, Tiki, Tiki Room" from Walt Disney's Enchanted Tiki Room at the Magic Kingdom. Carly and Darius report live from Walt Disney World to check out Fantasmic at Disney's Hollywood Studios.

12.title: FHO with Disney Descendants Sofia Carson
12.plot: Sofia Carson from Disney Descendants drops by FHO to hang with Mitchell and Fiona. Watch and hear why Sofia loves being a Disney Descendant and see the gang try to act out classic Walt Disney World rides.

13.title: Hidden Mickeys at Disney's Hollywood Studios
13.plot: Carly and Darius head to Hollywood Studios to find Hidden Mickeys.

14.title: Game Time with Working with Lemons
14.plot: Working With Lemons drops by FHO to play a game of Paint-tionary (think Pictionary but with paint!)

15.title: Hashtag Bag at Disney Springs
15.plot: Carly and Darius head to Disney Springs at Walt Disney World Resort to play a little game of Hashtag Bag.

16.title: Hanging Out with Skylar Stecker
16.plot: Skylar Stecker drops by FHO to share her favorite ride at Walt Disney World Resort and to play a game of 'What's in the Box' with Fiona and Mitchell.

17.title: Totally True - Fairy False
17.plot: Carly and Darius head to Disney's Animal Kingdom Park at Walt Disney World Resort to play a trivia game with some of our park guests.

18.title: Animal Facts - Disney's Animal Kingdom
18.plot: Mitchell and Fiona head to Disney's Animal Kingdom Park at Walt Disney World Resort to test guests on their animal knowledge after a trip on Kilimanjaro Safaris. Can you get these animal facts correct?

19.title: Hanging Out with 'Little Froggy'
19.plot: Little Froggy from MyFroggyStuff drops by FHO to chat about some of her arts and crafts and play a game of 'Mini Mania' with Fiona and Mitchell.

20.title: Walt Disney World Food Challenge
20.plot: From Turkey Legs to Mickey Premium Ice Cream Bars, Mitchell Gregorio and Fiona Frills visit Walt Disney World Resort for a fun 'Food Challenge' on this week's episode of FHO. What is your favorite treat to eat when you visit Walt Disney World?

21.title: Friends Hanging Out Finale - Best of FHO
21.plot: Mitchell Gregorio and Fiona Frills recap some of their favorite moments from FHO. From playing games with Little Froggy, Working with Lemons and Miles Brown from ABC's Black-ish, to meeting Disney Channel Stars like Sofia Carson, Peyton List, Calum Worthy and Jake Short, there are so many fun times to look back on.

locations: Disney Digital Network, 3507-3521 Eastham Drive, Los Angeles, California, USA::(studio)
Walt Disney World, Lake Buena Vista, Florida, USA::(Park and Rides)
imdb.plot outline: About FHO (Friends Hanging Out): #FHO is a totally awesome series with fun, games, adventure, and celebrity guests. It's THE place for the latest trending topics, social media games, and updates on your favorite stars. Guests include our friends from the Disney Channel, some of your favorite YouTubers and even visitors at Walt Disney Word.
